items.name: Mentor, Rensselaer Center of Open Source
items.summary: Organized and helped manage a small group of open source projects throughout the semester. Helped diagnose and solve any technical problems within my group of projects. Graded weekly project status updates, as well as mid-year and final reports.

items.name: Social Media Head, RPI-IEEE
items.summary: Re-wrote the RPI-IEEE website to use modern technologies such as EJS and Bootstrap, allowing it to be easier to maintain and modularize. Maintained the club's Discord server, Facebook page, and LinkedIn page.

items.name: DormDesign
items.summary: Full-stack web application that allows roommates to collaboratively design and plan our their dorm room. Users can keep track of different items and position them in the room using the editor. All actions are updated and displayed to all users viewing the room in real-time using Websockets.

items.name: Nice, Static Site Generator
items.summary: Portable static site generator written using Haxe. Uses a mix of Markdown and HTML for templating and YAML for project configuration. Supports hscript scripting for configuring Nice's behavior without recompilation.

items.name: Mace Game Engine
items.summary: Personal game engine that utilizes an Entity-Compononent-System architecture and Lua scripting. Supports an input binding system, infinite tilemap system, and a camera manager. Leverages EnTT, Sol 2.0, hlohmann::json, and C++17.

items.name: Mox Programming Language
items.summary: Object oriented programming language that compiles into C99. Leverages ANTLR4 for generating the parser and lexer, and Java for generating the respective C99 expressions. Supports variables, templating, classes, conditionals, loops, and a C to Mox interface.

items.name: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
list: Data Structures, Foundations of Computer Science, Computer Organization, Introduction to Algorithms, Principles of Software, Software Design & Documentation, Foundations of HCI Usability

items.name: North Middlesex Regional High School
list: Founder of the Computer Science club, President of National Honor Society, Vice-President of Class Office

sections.title: Skills
list: Programming Languages: C, C++, MIPS, Go, Javascript / Typescript, HTML, CSS, Python, Lua, Java
Frameworks & Libraries: Node.js, React.js, Vue.js, Express.js, Socket.io, Websockets, Bootstrap
Technologies: Linux, macOS, Unix, Git, Valgrind, RethinkDB, MongoDB, Redis
